body_html:
I guess the following issue is the side effect of this problem:
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/cudnn-status-bad-param-and-lstm/5604
Anyway, I'll open up a separate ticket for this new one, but posted here in case of more test cases for the current problem.

Update: I opened a new thread for theCUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM and LSTM:
here is the link to the #2267

body:
I guess the following issue is the side effect of this problem:
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/cudnn-status-bad-param-and-lstm/5604
Anyway, I'll open up a separate ticket for this new one, but posted here in case of more test cases for the current problem.

Update: I opened a new thread for theCUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM and LSTM:
 here is the link to the  https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/2267
